#summary An introduction to the monolithandroid application.

= Introduction =

monolithandroid is a tetris like game for the android platform.

http://monolithandroid.googlecode.com/files/20080117_monolithandroid_intro.png

= Details =

monolithandroid is released under the Apache 2.0 licence. The reasons for developing this application include:


*Familiarization with the Android platform and OpenGL/ES in particular.


*Development of a fun game to play on a mobile platform.
